quote: A year from now you may wish you had started today.
author: Karen Lamb

quote: If you want to fly, you have to give up the things that weigh you down.
author: Toni Morrison

quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
author: Unknown

quote: You can waste your lives drawing lines. Or you can live your life crossing them.
author: Shonda Rhimes

quote: Your time is limited, don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: If you want something you’ve never had, you must be willing to do something you’ve never done.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: When you know better, you do better.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Don’t let what you can’t do stop you from doing what you can do.
author: John Wooden

quote: We can do anything we want to if we stick to it long enough.
author: Helen Keller

quote: I am deliberate and afraid of nothing.
author: Audre Lorde

quote: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

quote: I didn’t get there by wishing for it or hoping for it, but by working for it.
author: Estée Lauder

quote: You learn more from failure than from success.
author: Unknown

quote: Don’t be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
author: Jim Ryun

quote: There is no traffic jam along the extra mile.
author: Roger Staubach

quote: You are never too old to reinvent yourself.
author: Steve Harvey

quote: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Doubt whom you will, but never yourself.
author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quote: Sometimes we're tested not to show our weaknesses, but to discover our strengths.
author: Unknown

quote: Everything negative – pressure, challenges – is all an opportunity for me to rise.
author: Kobe Bryant

quote: Do not be embarrassed by your failures, learn from them and start again.
author: Richard Branson

quote: Action is the foundational key to all success.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Strength does not come from the physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: A goal without a plan is just a wish.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quote: Success is getting what you want. Happiness is wanting what you get.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: Energy and persistence conquer all things.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Don’t tell people your plans. Show them your results.
author: Unknown

quote: Small deeds done are better than great deeds planned.
author: Peter Marshall

quote: Inspiration does exist, but it must find you working.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Wake up with determination. Go to bed with satisfaction.
author: Unknown

quote: The expert in anything was once a beginner.
author: Helen Hayes

quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Work hard in silence, let your success be your noise.
author: Frank Ocean

quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
author: Og Mandino

quote: I can and I will. Watch me.
author: Carrie Green

quote: You can do anything, but not everything.
author: David Allen

quote: Difficult roads often lead to beautiful destinations.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: The secret of success is to do the common things uncommonly well.
author: John D. Rockefeller

quote: Don’t wish it were easier. Wish you were better.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Well done is better than well said.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Your passion is waiting for your courage to catch up.
author: Isabelle Lafleche

quote: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
author: George Addair

quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
author: Arthur Ashe
